titleStmt.title: A Journal of the Venetian campaigne, A.D. 1687, under the conduct of the Capt. General Morosini, General Coningsmark, [brace] [brace] Providitor Gen. Cornaro, General Venieri, &c. translated from the Italian original, sent from Venice, and printed by order of the most serene republick.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H.C. and sold by R. Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
